mapper.select: select enterprise.*,swiper.id,swiper.imgurl,swiper.category from enterprise right join swiper on enterprise.qid = swiper.qid where enterprise.qid=#{qid} and swiper.category='A';
mapper.delete: delete from swiper where qid = #{qid} and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into address (aid, qid, branch, address, tel, longitude, latitude,isDeleted) values (null, #{qid}, #{branch}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{longitude}, #{latitude},#{isDeleted});
insert into teacher(tid, tname, tphoto, introduction, qid) values(null, #{tname}, #{tphoto}, #{introduction}, #{qid});
mapper.delete: delete from teacher where qid=#{qid} and tid=#{tid};
mapper.insert: insert into firstpageofteachers (id, qid, img) values (null, #{qid}, #{img});
mapper.select: SELECT * from address JOIN (SELECT * FROM lessonbranch where lid = #{lid}) t on address.aid = t.branchid where address.qid = #{qid}
